title: Kago (Travelling Chair), from a photography album with images of Japan
description: young woman seated in a sling-like chair attached to a pole held on the shoulders of two young men; woman wears light blue kimono with pink flowers on the shoulder; sling covered in multicolored patchwork fabric; bundle and parasol tied to top of pole; men wear short open shirts, loincloths and plant fiber sandals
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
